amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to increase funding for the National Institutes of Health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 525 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
